_header: It is a wonder by the Rood
_description: A poser attacking duplicity — two couplets

BLRoy17Axvi.Transcription:
It is a wonder be þe rode Whan too hediisLook in a hodeAnd
                    in þis worlde kan I not Rede Whan tootunges speke in on
                    hede
BLRoy17Axvi.Note:
The verse lines overrun the manuscript line due to insufficient space on
                    the folio.
